did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Methodist Episcopal Church Rogersville Charge steward's book, 1861-1895.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Methodist Episcopal Church. Rogersville Charge (South Dansville, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One volume of quarterly conference meeting minutes of the Rogersville Charge, after 1880 called the South Dansville Charge, including classes of North and South Oak Hill and Beachville.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Methodist Episcopal Church of Rogersville was organized sometime before its meeting house was built in 1840 in the township of what is now South Dansville. Two other Methodist charges in North and South Oak Hill combined with it sometime after 1840 to form the Rogersville Charge, an appointment on the area circuit. The Oak Hill charges, and a class at Beachville retained their separate identities while services were performed on alternate Sundays by the pastor of the Rogersville church. The Rogersville charge (after about 1880 the South Dansville Charge) was organized as a part of the Genesee Conference.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One volume of quarterly conference meeting minutes of the Rogersville Charge, after 1880 called the South Dansville Charge, including classes of North and South Oak Hill and Beachville.
